devdoc.details: A switch on arbitrum turning a light on and off on arbitrum with the Vea bridge.

lightBulbToggled(uint64,address).details: The Fast Bridge participants watch for these events to decide if a challenge should be submitted.

params.lightBulbOwner: The address of the owner of the lightbulb on the L2 side.
params.messageId: The id of the message sent to the lightbulb.

devdoc.title: Lightbulb
